scripts.dev: echo "Error: no dev command specified" && exit 1
scripts.build: echo "Error: no build command specified" && exit 1
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run test && standard-version && git push --follow-tags && npm run build && npm publish
scripts.release:alpha: npm run build && npm run test && standard-version --release-as major --prerelease alpha && git push --follow-tags && npm run build && npm publish --tag alpha
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run unit
